item.title: 4 Principles of Data Visualization
item.description: 1. Above all else, show the data Minimize the administrative items on screen, maximize the information presented. 2. Prioritize the information Determine 3-5 most important information. Highlight them. 3. Relate the information Juxtapose, compose and reference the data so it is more meaningful. 4. Leverage the interactivity Overview, zoom, filter. You can reveal information gradually so it is not too clouded. General List, Categorise, Prioritise. How could the core data be more useful by showing related data around it?
